text: Do a jumping jack if you have ever bungee jumped
[Name] do 3 jumping jacks if you have ever been in a car accident
Do 4 pushups if you have a phobia
Would you rather eat a live cockroach or be bald? Everyone vote at the same time, losing group does 2 jumping jacks
Around the room, name your ex relationships/hookups one at a time. The first person to run out of names, do 3 jumping jacks. [Name] you start
Maximum penalty! Everyone do 3 jumping jacks if you are of Irish descent
Maximum penalty! Everyone do 3 jumping jacks if you have watched all seasons of Game of Thrones
